title: Our First Year on YouTube: A Conversation with Colin
description:
Holy crap -- we've been doing this for a year! Allow Greg and Colin to properly thank you, tell the YouTube channel's origin, and run through their favorite moments.

Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.

Follow us on Twitter
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/notaxation

#AConversationWithColin Playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL85130F65C312F61E&feature=plcp

Huge thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

I corrected the following:

* "comic gorons" to "Comic Gorons" (assuming it's a reference to a comic or a character)
* "Batman's a quarter of the way there so just keep watching him just watch him over and over over" to remove unnecessary repetition
* "Freddy fingers" to "Freddy Fingers" (assuming it's a reference to a person or a character, possibly a play on Freddy Krueger)
* "Col I think that is about wraps up this conversation" to maintain the original sentence structure and grammar
* "business ter" to "business terms"
* "vend diagram" to "venture diagram" (assuming it's a reference to a business concept or term, possibly a play on words with "venture")
* "parall course" to "parallel course"
